DESCRIPTION: All Warrior-Type monsters you control gain 400 ATK. If you control another monster, monsters your opponent controls cannot target this card for an attack.
NAME: Command Knight

DESCRIPTION: If this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the GY: Destroy the monster that destroyed this card.
NAME: Yomi Ship

DESCRIPTION: FLIP: Target 1 monster on the field; destroy that target.
NAME: Man-Eater Bug

DESCRIPTION: Cannot be destroyed by battle. After damage calculation, if this card was attacked, and was face-down at the start of the Damage Step: The attacking player takes 1000 damage.
NAME: Marshmallon

DESCRIPTION: During damage calculation in your opponent's turn, if this card is being attacked: You can target the attacking monster; make that target's ATK 0 during damage calculation only (this is a Quick Effect). This effect can only be used once while this card is face-up on the field.
NAME: Suijin

DESCRIPTION: Once per turn, you can select 1 of your opponent's monsters that is removed from play. Until the End Phase, this card's name is treated as the selected monster's name, and this card has the same Attribute, Level, ATK, and DEF as the selected monster. If this card is removed from the field while this effect is applied, remove it from play.
NAME: Scanner

DESCRIPTION: The ATK of this card is the combined Levels of all face-up monsters you control x 300.
NAME: The Calculator

DESCRIPTION: You can Normal Summon/Set this card without Tributing, but its original ATK becomes 1900. You can Tribute 3 monsters to Tribute Summon (but not Set) this card. If Summoned this way: Destroy all cards your opponent controls.
NAME: Beast King Barbaros

DESCRIPTION: Your opponent cannot activate Trap Cards during the Battle Phase.
NAME: Mirage Dragon

DESCRIPTION: Once per turn: You can discard 1 card, then target 1 Level 7 or higher monster in your Graveyard; add that target to your hand.
NAME: Herald of Creation

DESCRIPTION: If this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard: Destroy the monster that destroyed it. Neither player takes any battle damage from attacks involving this attacking card.
NAME: Exploder Dragon

DESCRIPTION: When this card is Normal Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower Normal Monster from your hand in Defense Position.
NAME: Terratiger, the Empowered Warrior

DESCRIPTION: You can Special Summon this card (from your hand) by discarding 1 card.
NAME: The Tricky

DESCRIPTION: Once per turn, when your monster is targeted for an attack: You can negate that attack, then Special Summon 1 Cyberse Normal Monster from your hand, Deck, or GY.
NAME: Texchanger

DESCRIPTION: A monster with tremendous power, it destroys enemies with a swing of its axe.
NAME: Battle OX

DESCRIPTION: An axe-wielding monster of tremendous strength and agility.
NAME: Axe Raider

DESCRIPTION: A small fiend that dwells in the dark, its single horn makes it a formidable opponent.
NAME: Horn Imp

DESCRIPTION: A snow wolf that's beautiful to the eye, but absolutely vicious in battle.
NAME: Silver Fang

DESCRIPTION: A malevolent creature wrapped in flames that attacks enemies with intense fire.
NAME: Fireyarou

DESCRIPTION: A curtain that a spellcaster made, it is said to raise a dark power.
NAME: Curtain of the dark ones

DESCRIPTION: A playful little fiend that lurks in the dark, waiting to attack an unwary enemy.
NAME: Feral Imp

DESCRIPTION: The ultimate wizard in terms of attack and defense.
NAME: Dark magician

DESCRIPTION: A creature that electrocutes opponents with bolts of lightning.
NAME: Wattkid

DESCRIPTION: Much more than just a child, this dragon is gifted with untapped power.
NAME: Baby dragon

DESCRIPTION: Feel da strength ah dis sword-swinging samurai from da Far East.
NAME: Hero of the east

DESCRIPTION: A warrior that fights with his bare hands!!!
NAME: Battle warrior

DESCRIPTION: This weakened dragon can no longer fly, but is still a deadly force to be reckoned with.
NAME: Crawling dragon

DESCRIPTION: This Spellcaster attacks enemies with fire-related spells such as "Sea of Flames" and "Wall of Fire".
NAME: Flame manipulator

DESCRIPTION: This legendary dragon is a powerful engine of destruction. Virtually invincible, very few have faced this awesome creature and lived to tell the tale.
NAME: Blue-Eyes white dragon

DESCRIPTION: This monster can only be Ritual Summoned with the Ritual Spell Card, "Turtle Oath". You must also offer monsters whose total Level Stars equal 8 or more as a Tribute from the field or your hand.
NAME: Crab Turtle

DESCRIPTION: This monster can only be Ritual Summoned with the Ritual Spell Card, "Novox's Prayer". You must also offer monsters whose total Level Stars equal 7 or more as a Tribute from the field or your hand.
NAME: Skull Guardian

DESCRIPTION: The machine's ability is said to vary according to its slot results.
NAME: Slot Machine

DESCRIPTION: An earthen figure that protects the tomb of an ancient ruler.
NAME: Haniwa

DESCRIPTION: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must first be Special Summoned (from your hand) by Tributing 1 "Sanga of the Thunder", "Kazejin", and "Suijin".
NAME: Gate Guardian

DESCRIPTION: A new species found in electronic space. There's not much information on it.
NAME: Bitron

DESCRIPTION: A territorial electronic monster that guards its own domain.
NAME: Leotron

DESCRIPTION: Many of the czars' lost jewels can be found in the scales of this priceless dragon. Its creator remains a mystery, along with how they acquired the imperial treasures. But whosoever finds this dragon has hit the jackpot... whether they know it or not.
NAME: Alexandrite Dragon

DESCRIPTION: The warrior who can manipulate dragons. Nobody knows his mysterious past.
NAME: Warrior Dai Grepher

DESCRIPTION: They say he is a dragon-manipulating warrior from the dark world. His attack is tremendous, using his great swords with vicious power.
NAME: Dark Blade

DESCRIPTION: Capable of indefinite flight. Attacks by wrapping its body with electricity and ramming into opponents. IMPORTANT: Capturing the "Wattaildragon" is forbidden by the Ancient Rules and is a Level 6 offense, the minimum sentence for which is imprisonment for no less than 2500 heliocycles.
NAME: Wattaildragon

DESCRIPTION: When huge whirlpools lay cities asunder, it is the hunger of this sea serpent at work. No one has ever escaped its dreaded Spiral Wave to accurately describe the terror they experienced.
NAME: Spiral Serpent
